Class ScaleScoresMatcher

All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureMatcher
public class ScaleScoresMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureMatcher

Re-scales the scores output from another FeatureMatcher

Constructor Detail

ScaleScoresMatcher

public ScaleScoresMatcher()
Creates a ScaleScoresMatcher without setting newZeroScore nor newFullScore. Be sure to set them.

ScaleScoresMatcher

public ScaleScoresMatcher(double newZeroScore,
                          double newFullScore)
Creates a ScaleScoresMatcher with the given control points.
Parameters:
newZeroScore - the score that will be warped to 0
newFullScore - the score that will be warped to 1
Method Detail

public void setNewFullScore(double newFullScore)
Sets one of the control points.

match

public Matches match(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature target,
                     com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.FeatureCollection candidates)
Scales the scores so that #newZeroScore becomes 0 and #newFullScore becomes 1. Scores outside of 0 and 1 get set to 0 and 1 respectively.
Specified by:
match in interface FeatureMatcher
Parameters:
target - ignored
candidates - a Matches object created by another FeatureMatcher
Returns:
the scaled scores
